entities.name: the advanced guard
entities.description: A group of people who are watching the band of wizards.

entities.name: moody
entities.description: A wizard who is part of the advanced guard and is handed a glass by Harry.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character who hands Moody a glass and asks about their journey.

entities.name: the band of wizards
entities.description: A group of people who are being watched by the advanced guard.

entities.name: lupin
entities.description: A wizard who is part of the group and explains how they will be traveling.

entities.name: kingsley shacklebolt
entities.description: A wizard who praises Lupin's flying skills.

entities.name: remus
entities.description: The person being referred to by Kingsley Shacklebolt.

entities.name: tonks
entities.description: A wizard who offers to help Harry pack.

relationships.description: Moody is handed a glass by Harry.
Kingsley Shacklebolt praises Lupin's flying skills.
Tonks offers to help Harry pack.
Lupin is referred to by Kingsley Shacklebolt as 'Remus'.
The advanced guard is watching Harry.
Moody and the advanced guard are watching the band of wizards.
Lupin explains how they will be traveling to Harry.
Kingsley Shacklebolt refers to Lupin as 'Remus'.
